hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: WITHREBOOT
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Enable reboots during the mkcloud run (incl. crowbar and compute node).

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: add update repos before crowbar install

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: WITHTEMPEST
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Runs the tempest testsuite after successfully setting up a cloud

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TESTHEAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if non-empty, test latest version from Devel:Cloud (:1.0)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: nodenumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: number of nodes excl. admin-node minimum 2=controller+compute

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# use IBS://Devel:Cloud latest iso image #export cloudsource=develcloud #export cloudsource=susecloud # use latest packages from IBS://Devel:Cloud on top #export TESTHEAD=1 export CVOL=/dev/loop4 losetup /dev/loop4 || losetup /dev/loop4 /abuild/cloud #export nodenumber=4 # disable ceph, now that it has been validated, to speed up cloud runs. export cephvolumenumber=2 # for ceph&swift export debug=0
if [ ! -z "$UPDATEREPOS" ] ; then # testing update only makes sense with GM and without TESTHEAD # unset TESTHEAD # export cloudsource=GM export UPDATEREPOS=${UPDATEREPOS//$'\n'/+} fi
export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore
[ -e ~/bin/update_automation ] || curl -o ~/bin/update_automation https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SUSE-Cloud/automation/master/scripts/jenkins/update_automation && chmod a+x ~/bin/update_automation # fetch the latest automation updates update_automation mkcloud jenkins-job-trigger
MKCLOUDTARGET=all_noreboot [ $WITHREBOOT == "true" ] && MKCLOUDTARGET=all [ $UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL == "true" ] && MKCLOUDTARGET='cleanup prepare setupadmin addupdaterepo instcrowbar setupcompute instcompute proposal testsetup' [ $WITHTEMPEST == "true" ] && MKCLOUDTARGET="$MKCLOUDTARGET tempest"
# also run crowbarbackup and crowbarrestore case $cloudsource in develcloud[34]|susecloud[34]) MKCLOUDTARGET="$MKCLOUDTARGET crowbarbackup crowbarrestore" ;; esac
starttime=`date +%s` perl -e "alarm 90*60 ; exec '/root/pool/allocpool bash -x /root/bin/mkcloud $(echo -n $MKCLOUDTARGET) ' "
[ -z "$TESTHEAD" ] && exit 0
case "$cloudsource" in develcloud2.0) project=Devel:Cloud:2.0 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; develcloud3) project=Devel:Cloud:3 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; develcloud4) project=Devel:Cloud:4 subproject=Staging packagefilter="crowbar python openstack" ;; *) echo "nothing to submit" exit 0 ;; esac
jenkins-job-trigger openstack-submit-project -p project="${project}" subproject="${subproject}" packagefilter="${packagefilter}" starttime="${starttime}"
